<script>
$.ajax({
url: '#url#/#path#',
type: 'GET',
success: function(data) {
var keys = Object.keys(data[0]);
var select = $("#select-#label#");
for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { 
 var option = `<option value=`+data[i]["#id#"]+`>`+data[i]["#value#"]+`</option>`;
select.append(option);
}
}
})
</script>
